description: This file sets up an AI agent with specific tools and configuration, then runs an asynchronous method to generate a response based on a topic.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of generating responses.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: A model class used to specify the language model for the agent.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool for performing searches using DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: Newspaper4kTools
classes.description: A tool for extracting article content from URLs using newspaper4k.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response based on a given topic.
